author: Bruce Borthwick
description: A festive tipple that captures the flavour of that British Christmas staple, the mince pie.
name: Mincemeat Pie
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
FLOAT layer of cream on drink
